byline: Sally Herships, Sam Beard, Dan Weissmann, Adrienne Hill and Sabri Ben-Achour
description: Airing on Monday December 29, 2014: It's Black Monday, the day after the end of the NFL regular season when many losing teams fire their coaches, starting a mad dash to hire new ones. Plus, Greece faces economic uncertainty after its parliament today rejected the presidential candidate put forward by Prime Minister Antonis Samaras. Finally, the search for the AirAsia airbus with 162 people on board continues over Indonesian waters.  What do we know about this airline?

title: Marketplace for Monday December 29, 2014
